column1:
[Serious] Do you have pineapple?


Some time ago a Brit on reddit told me that pineapple was like, contraband in Britain. Can you possess pineapple or not.

Why are most dentists in houses?


My friend asked me this recently and I really can't work out why most of the dentists in the UK are in houses. Doctors and opticians seem to be in normal buildings, but why are dentists different?
